name: TheHazmat
description:
In the game you are the last hazmat left out of a team sent to recover an antidote in a facility, after your team was killed of in a sweep you are the last one left, complete the mission or die trying.

--------Controls--------

Arrow Keys and WASD - To Move

Q  - To pickup items and interact

E - To Equip a weapon

Use Number Keys to switch weapons 1,2,3,4,5

Left Click - To Shoot

Thank you for playing.

Any Feedback is greatly appreciated.
